docs.lead_paragraph: Remember WIN buttons? Those relics of the mid-1970's, with their "Whip Inflation Now" slogan avidly promoted by President Gerald R. Ford, are collector items today, reminders of a misty past that apparently shows no signs of returning. Indeed, the United States has just gone through five consecutive years of the lowest level of consumer price inflation since the economy's golden run in the mid-1960's.
